pageTitle: Effects of Vaporized Marijuana on Neuropathic Pain - Study Results - ClinicalTrials.gov
textBeforeTable: Participant Flow:   Overall Study All participants were randomized to a 3 way cross over design and received 3.53% THC, 1.29% THC and placebo cannabis. All Participants Description   Reporting Groups Twenty subjects did not receive study medication: 9 withdrew for various reasons and 11 were disqualified following a medical evaluation with subsequent disclosure of exclusionary criteria on a physical exam or laboratory finding. Significant events and approaches for the overall study following participant enrollment, but prior to group assignment Pre-Assignment Details Recruitment took place at the UCDMC and VA Northern California Pain clinics,UCDMC Spinal Cord Injury Clinic, and newspaper advertisements. Between December 2009 and March 2011, 59 patients were consented to enroll in the study. Key information relevant to the recruitment process for the overall study, such as dates of the recruitment period and locations Recruitment Details   Hide Participant Flow
